name: Modern Language Studies
descriptions: Knowing a foreign language will make you more competitive in the job market in fields such as business, government, hospitality, international nonprofits, hospitality, travel and tourism, library science, financial and banking services, interpreting and translating, fine arts, education and the military.

Our graduates have gone on to succeed as attorneys, administrators, medical professionals and professors. Here are a few examples:

    Project manager, Fraport AG in Germany
    Legal director, Brainloop
    Fulbright fellow, Mohamed V University in Morocco
    German and history teacher, Arlington High School
    Engagement officer, Akola Project
    Registered Nurse, Providence Health Center
    Project specialist, Mercy Corps in Democratic Republic of Congo
